snippet.title: More troubles for Salim Mehajer
snippet.content: THERE'S more trouble for embattled former Auburn councillor Salim Mehajer, with police to apply for a fresh apprehended violence order against him on behalf of his estranged wife Aysha. It's the latest court battle for the property developer and former local councillor, who first came to wide attention when he wed his . NSW Police confirmed on Tuesday a new application for an AVO would be made on August 9 in Sutherland Local Court, The pair married in an which shut down a street in 2015, and the August 9 court date is less than a week short of when they would have celebrated their second wedding anniversary. But they split last year, with police , preventing him from contacting or approaching her. Mr Mehajer is currently embroiled in a series of court battles, . Two businesses this year. Originally published as
